name: Handsel and Gretel Reloaded LD 50
description:
A game about delaying the inevitable barfing

The game only supports controllers right now unfortunately 

Controls:

Left stick to Move.

Left trigger to jump. (uses three energy).

Right trigger to dash. (uses one energy).

Explaination of Gameplay: 

Survive as long as you can, and rack up the highest score you can.

The two ways to loose:

1. Fill up your barf meter. Hitting one object gives you a letter, if you get 5 letters (b,a,r,f,d) you loose. 

2. You run out of time.

you gain more time by reaching the generators (the next generators direction is indicated by the flashing purple orb).

Pickups give you energy and a tiny time boost:

1. Snakes are safe, eat them for energy and time. if you eat the whole snake you will reduce one barf letter on the barf counter. 

2. Candy (the box shaped objects) are safe too, eat them for time and energy. 

Advoid:

1. Walls, they will hurt you. go around them or jump over them.

2. Spikes, and bullets these will hurt you if you hit them. you can:

a. jump over them,

b.  advoid them,

c. spin into them to destroy them.

3. the cannons shoot the bullets you can spin into them to destory them. 

Look out for machines to trade energy for barf letters or time.

Good luck.
